brDecisionText.para:
The child element <reducedPara> of <frontMatterList> shall be used to contain:
LOEP:
"This publication includes the following pages after insertion of issue XXX, dated dd-month-yyy."
"C = Changed page; N = New page."
LOEDM:
"The listed documents is included last revision: dd-month-yyy."
"C = Changed page; N = New page."
Highlights: "The listed changes are introduced in issue XXX, dated dd-month-yyy, of this publication."
Updating Instruction:
"Remove or insert data modules as listed in Table 1."
"I = Insert data module; R = Remove data module."
